8.19.20  4:52 am   Hey I want to make music. I already do, I've been for years, but I suck at all musical instruments I've tried at (for years), and at making music too. I'm very stressed by my personal and education stuff and as a result I always feel tired, leaving me with no energy to focus on any instrument enough to actually improve. Usually I play whatever I feel like, mess around which can be fun but on non-polyphonic instruments gets boring quickly.
8.19.20  4:14 am   do you see yourself making music just like "monday candle trivia"?

8.19.20  3:43 am   hi Bill!! i noticed that there are those who are complimenting you for your positive impact on their lives so i thought i could join along; your advice to me on 6.23.18 11:29pm (2 years ago!) was very helpful. I have gained many experiences and i grow better and better with each experience i gained. this is just a reminder that youre aWesOmE, aMaZinG and aStrOnOmIcaL and dont tell yourself otherwise :^))

8.19.20  12:21 am   i just wanted to say i appreciate the fact that you are very human. the way you present yourself, this website, everything. i appreciate SO MUCH the fact that i can tell you made everything yourself, and that i'm interacting with a human right now. i don't know how to say this. just, that basically everyone else on the internet exudes a barrier of Marketing Firms and Advertising Agencies in between them and their audience and somehow you discovered that it was very possible and easy to subvert all of that but nobody else thought of doing it.

do you like pancakes (conceptually)?
